summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5732 for the improvement of 27th Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 75th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75717, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
